abstract: General Electric‘s property investment arm said on Tuesdy that it has bought a portfolio of loans from Credit Suisse for 642 million euros ($1.01 billion).
lead_paragraph: General Electric‘s property investment arm said on Tuesdy that it has bought a portfolio of loans from Credit Suisse for 642 million euros ($1.01 billion).

headline.main: G.E. to Buy $1 Billion in European Loans From Credit Suisse
